entries.title: Root Monorepo Kurulumu
changes: Root script'ler eklendi: dev, build, lint, format, test, typecheck, clean
npm install ile workspaces basariyla test edildi

entries.title: Backend Package Kurulumu
changes: Backend package.json guncellendi: type: module eklendi
Runtime dependencies eklendi: express@4.22.1, socket.io@4.8.3, jsonwebtoken@9.0.3, bcryptjs@2.4.3, zod@3.25.76, cors@2.8.6, uuid@11.1.0, dotenv@16.6.1

Dev dependencies eklendi: typescript@5.7.3, @types/node@22.10.7, @types/express@5.0.0, @types/jsonwebtoken@9.0.7, @types/bcryptjs@2.4.6, @types/cors@2.8.17, @types/uuid@10.0.0, tsx@4.19.2, nodemon@3.1.9, eslint@9.18.0, prettier@3.4.2, vitest@3.0.4
Backend scripts guncellendi: dev (tsx watch), build (tsc), start (node dist/index.js)
npm install basariyla tamamlandi (105 paket yuklendi)
Tum runtime ve dev bagimliliklar dogrulandi
